prompt: Environmental portrait: A professional marketing manager (age 30-40, diverse) stands confidently at a modern office desk in a bright, open SaaS workspace. The office features clean lines, glass partitions, and subtle indigo or cyan accent details. The manager is mid-celebration—perhaps with a raised fist, genuine smile, or sharing a light moment with a nearby colleague. Lighting is soft, cool, and evenly diffused from large windows, with no harsh shadows. The color palette is desaturated with cool neutrals and brand-aligned pops of indigo or cyan. Composition uses the rule of thirds, with 30% negative space to one side for openness. The mood is energized but focused, conveying capability and purposeful momentum. Editorial documentary style, natural and authentic, with a Stripe-Linear sophistication. No screens, text, or abstract elements present.

Environmental portrait: Professional Asian woman, early 30s, marketing director, standing confidently in a modern SaaS office with clean lines, glass partitions, and abundant natural light. She has a relaxed, confident smile and stands slightly off-center, with cool-neutral tones and subtle indigo or cyan accents in the environment. Soft overcast daylight, even illumination, minimal shadows. Editorial documentary style, authentic moment. 30% negative space on left. Mood: capable momentum, poised energy. Desaturated environment, cool palette, Stripe-Linear sophistication.

Collaborative cluster: Professional Black man, growth lead, late 30s, and one other diverse colleague, engaged in a focused discussion while standing at a modern high table in a bright, open SaaS office. Both show confident, purposeful expressions and upright posture. Environment features clean architectural lines, glass, and cool-neutral colors with hints of indigo/cyan. Soft, overcast daylight, even lighting. Rule of thirds composition, 25% negative space to the right. Mood: confident clarity and momentum. Editorial documentary style, authentic interaction, modern professionalism.

Environmental portrait: Professional Hispanic woman, VP marketing, mid-30s, satisfied smile, leaning casually against a minimalist desk in a modern SaaS office flooded with natural light. Office features neutral cool tones, architectural details, and subtle indigo or cyan accents. She is slightly off-center, with upright posture and open gesture, conveying confidence and approachability. Soft, even daylight, minimal shadows. Editorial documentary style, medium shot, 20% vertical negative space above. Mood: empowered capability and clarity. Desaturated surroundings, cool palette, Stripe/Linear-inspired sophistication.

Environmental portrait: One professional founder, age 30-40, diverse background, standing confidently in a modern SaaS office with glass partitions, clean lines, and minimalistic decor. The founder wears a tailored indigo blazer over a casual shirt, arms relaxed, slight purposeful smile, upright posture. Office features concrete floors, metal fixtures, and subtle cyan accents in the environment. Abundant natural light streams through large windows, creating a soft, even, cool-neutral illumination (5500K), with minimal shadows. Mood is capable momentum and calm confidence. Framing is a medium 3/4 shot with the founder off-center (rule of thirds), 25% negative space to the left. Editorial documentary style, authentic and natural, with a crisp, desaturated palette and subtle pops of indigo/cyan for brand alignment.

Environmental portrait: A happy, confident growth marketer (age 28-40, diverse representation) stands in a modern SaaS office, celebrating a recent success. The workspace features clean architectural lines, glass walls, and minimal decor, with abundant natural light streaming through large windows. The marketer wears professional-casual attire—an indigo blazer over a crisp t-shirt, relaxed yet polished. The mood is energized and capable, with a purposeful smile and upright, open body language. Composition uses a 3/4 angle with the subject off-center, significant negative space on one side, and a cool-neutral color palette with subtle cyan accents in the environment. Editorial documentary style, natural moment, authentic expression, Stripe/Linear sophistication.
